name: THE { } AND
description:
{THE AND} | Ask. Answer. Connect.

Play the game with partners, friends, family, ex-couples, first dates, and even strangers! Anytime. Anywhere.

Hundreds of customized questions at your finger tips. Ask the questions you've been dying to know but too afraid to ask -- without the steep relationship counseling sessions!

Based off the award-winning interactive documentary {THE AND} that explores the dynamics of modern relationships, this app creates the space to have real honest conversations. Perfect for cozy dinners with your friends, lazy Sundays with your partner, awkward family holidays, lonely flights, and basically everywhere else.
